title: Matrix Function Block
description: This function block processes boolean input signals to generate a corresponding code based on the changes detected in input lines. It manages the state of the outputs based on the comparison of current input states and previous states, handling a release condition to reset the code when necessary.
name: MATRIX

input.name: Release
input.description: A constant input signal indicating whether to release the generated code.

output.name: code
output.description: The generated code based on the input changes.

output.name: TP
output.description: A flag indicating whether a change has been detected.

output.name: y1
output.description: Output signal derived from the processed code (default TRUE).

output.name: y2
output.description: Second output signal derived from the processed code.

output.name: y3
output.description: Third output signal derived from the processed code.

output.name: y4
output.description: Fourth output signal derived from the processed code.
